items.sentence: Tom spends most of his free time reading comics.
Tom has been working here for over thirty years.
I could have done better if I had had more time.
I could run quite a bit faster when I was young.
The problem is that we don\'t know where Tom is.
Tom told Mary something he\'d never told anyone.
Tom realized that Mary wasn\'t paying attention.
Do you really think Tom will want to go with us?
Tom didn\'t tell Mary he couldn\'t speak French.
Tom and Mary plan on getting married in October.
